Attraction.Name: LEGOLAND MALAYSIA

Description.Price:
FREE for children under 3
Ticket starts from RM 69.00
The ticket can buy Three park (Theme Park, Aquarium, Water Park) or can buy single park.

Attraction.Opening_Hours:
Theme Park 10 a.m. to 6 p.m. CLosed on every Wednesday
Water Park 10 a.m. to 6 p.m. CLosed on every Tuesday
Sea Life 10 a.m. to 6 p.m. Open everyday

Description.Price:
Free for children aged below 3 years
Adults RM 60.00 to RM 75.00

Attraction.Name: Escape Penang

Description.Price:
Single-Day Admission Price: Starting from RM 183.00
Includes: Access to all rides and attractions, including the Ski Slope and Dead Sea Pool
Multi-Day Packages with BASE CAMP Stay 2 Days 1 Night: Includes: Two-day park access and overnight camping at BASE CAMP
3 Days 2 Nights: Includes: Three-day park access and two nights at BASE CAMP
Note: BASE CAMP stays are complimentary with the purchase of 2-day or 3-day tickets

Attraction.Opening_Hours:
Tuesday to Sunday: 10:00 AM to 6:00 PM
Closed on Mondays (except during public and school holidays)

Attraction.Name: Royal Selangor Visitor Centre

Description.Price:
Free Admission
Workshops School of hard knocks- RM 80.00 per session (30 mins)
the foundry- RM 180.00 per session (60 mins)

Attraction.Opening_Hours: 9.00 a.m. to 5.00 p.m. daily (including Public Holidays)

Attraction.Name: Sunway Lagoon

Description.Price:
For Malaysian Citizens: Adult (13 years and above): RM 180.00
Child (12 years and below): RM 145.00
Senior Citizen (60 years and above): RM 145.00
For Non-Malaysians: Adult: RM 250.00
Child/Senior: RM 200.00
Optional Add-ons: Quack Xpress Pass: RM 90.00 (Allows you to skip regular queues at selected rides and attractions) 2-Day Fun Pass: Priced between RM 320.00 to RM 400.0, depending on visitor category.

Attraction.Opening_Hours:
Day Park: Open daily from 10:00 AM to 6:00 PM.
Closed on Tuesdays, except during public and school holidays.

Attraction.Name: The TOP Penang, Theme Park Penang

Description.Price:
Rainbow Skywalk (Single Entry): Adult: RM 68.00 (RM 61.00 online)
Child (90cm to 12 years), Senior (60+), OKU: RM 48.00 (RM 43.00 online)
Children below 90cm enter free.
Attraction Passes: 3-Attraction Pass: From RM 60.70
Includes: Rainbow Skywalk, Observatory Deck, Sky Bridge
5-Attraction Pass: From RM 66.40
Adds: Jurassic Research Centre, Penang Boutique Aquarium
12-Attraction Pass: From RM 115.60
Full access to all attractions, including: Tech Dome, Penang State Gallery, Durian King and Tongkat Ali Museum, and more.

Attraction.Opening_Hours:
General Attractions (e.g., Jurassic Research Center, Tech Dome, Aquarium, SkyBridge, Zombie Outbreak, etc.):
Daily: 10:00 AM to 7:00 PM
Rainbow Skywalk and Observatory Deck: Monday, Wednesday to Sunday: 10:00 AM to 10:00 PM
Tuesday: 10:00 AM to 7:00 PM
